title: How A Disgraced Reporter Tested The Public's Trust In Journalism
teaser: New York Times rising star Jayson Blair was busted in spring 2003 for plagiarizing and making up stories. Filmmaker Samantha Grant's new documentary, A Fragile Trust, sheds light on the scandal.
